metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/
aws::graph::propositions: # Regulatory and Legal Risks for Business Operations
Unfavorable regulations can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Unfavorable laws can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Unfavorable decisions by government authorities can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Unfavorable interpretations by government authorities can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Unfavorable interpretations by regulatory authorities can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Inquiries by government authorities can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Inquiries by regulatory authorities can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Investigations by government authorities can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Investigations by regulatory authorities can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Enforcement actions threatened by government authorities can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Enforcement actions threatened by regulatory authorities can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Enforcement actions initiated by government authorities can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Enforcement actions initiated by regulatory authorities can cause substantial costs to businesses.
Regulatory actions can expose businesses to unanticipated civil liability.
Regulatory actions can expose businesses to unanticipated criminal liability.
Regulatory actions can expose businesses to penalties including substantial monetary fines.
Regulatory actions can diminish the demand for businesses' products.
Regulatory actions can diminish the demand for businesses' services.
Regulatory actions can diminish the availability of businesses' products.
Regulatory actions can diminish the availability of businesses' services.
Regulatory actions can increase businesses' cost of doing business.
Regulatory actions can require businesses to change their business practices in a manner materially adverse to their business.
Regulatory actions can damage businesses' reputation.
Regulatory actions can impede businesses' growth.
Regulatory actions can have a material effect on businesses' operations.
Media scrutiny faced by businesses can amplify regulatory risks.
Political scrutiny faced by businesses can amplify regulatory risks.
Regulatory scrutiny faced by businesses can amplify regulatory risks.
Media scrutiny of businesses may continue to increase.
Political scrutiny of businesses may continue to increase.
Regulatory scrutiny of businesses may continue to increase.

metadata.header_path: /FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/
/FORM 10-K/Part I/Item 1A - Risk Factors/Legal and Regulatory Risks/

text: Unfavorable regulations, laws, decisions, or interpretations by government or regulatory authorities applying those laws and regulations, or inquiries, investigations, or enforcement actions threatened or initiated by them, could cause us to incur substantial costs, expose us to unanticipated civil and criminal liability or penalties (including substantial monetary fines), diminish the demand for, or availability of, our products and services, increase our cost of doing business, require us to change our business practices in a manner materially adverse to our business, damage our reputation, impede our growth, or otherwise have a material effect on our operations. The media, political, and regulatory scrutiny we face, which may continue to increase, amplifies these risks.
